languages.text: {n}Специально для врага был сымитирован "летальный инцидент" — выброс рад-излучения, вызванный вскрытым контейнером трансурана. Вскоре из него исчезла пригоршня опасной породы, и мудрые техножрецы с орбиты выследили логово монстра по рад-следу.{/n}

{n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Специально для врага был сымитирован "летальный инцидент" — выброс рад-излучения, вызванный вскрытым контейнером трансурана. Вскоре из него исчезла пригоршня опасной породы, и мудрые техножрецы с орбиты выследили логово монстра по рад-следу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At the cost of many lives, the troops have killed the slaves and the raging mechanisms, and the weakened creature disappeared in a flash of green light. The world had lost a lot of manpower and defences, but you have shown that the von Valancius dynasty needs no help and is ready to defend its interests at all costs. The Expanse will remember this.{/n}

{n}At the cost of many lives, the troops have killed the slaves and the raging mechanisms, and the weakened creature disappeared in a flash of green light. The world had lost a lot of manpower and defences, but you have shown that the von Valancius dynasty needs no help and is ready to defend its interests at all costs. The Expanse will remember this.{/n}

{n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

{n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

{n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

{n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}为了引起敌人的注意，看守们上演了一场“致命事故”——某个超铀容器被刻意打开，辐射泄露了出来。不久之后，这种危险物质的一部分不知被什么人窃取了。睿智的技术神甫立刻根据放射性痕迹，找到了怪物的巢穴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}为了引起敌人的注意，看守们上演了一场“致命事故”——某个超铀容器被刻意打开，辐射泄露了出来。不久之后，这种危险物质的一部分不知被什么人窃取了。睿智的技术祭司立刻根据放射性痕迹，找到了怪物的巢穴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Para atraer la atención del enemigo, se escenificó un «accidente mortal»: una fuga de radiación causada por un contenedor de transuranio abierto. Poco después, un puñado de este peligroso material desapareció, y los sabios tecnosacerdotes utilizaron el rastro radiactivo para localizar la guarida del monstruo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Para atraer la atención del enemigo, se escenificó un «accidente mortal»: una fuga de radiación causada por un contenedor de transuranio abierto. Poco después, un puñado de este peligroso material desapareció, y los sabios tecnosacerdotes utilizaron el rastro radiactivo para localizar la guarida del monstruo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}敵の注意を引くため、超ウラン容器の開放による放射能漏れの"致命的な事件"が仕組まれた。その直後、一握りのこの危険物質が行方不明になり、賢明な技術司祭らは放射性物質の痕跡から怪物の隠れ家を突き止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}敵の注意を引くため、超ウラン容器の開放による放射能漏れの"致命的な事件"が仕組まれた。その直後、一握りのこの危険物質が行方不明になり、賢明な技術司祭らは放射性物質の痕跡から怪物の隠れ家を突き止めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour appâter l'ennemi, un "incident mortel" est mis en scène : une fuite de radiations provoquée par un conteneur de transuranium laissé ouvert. Peu après, une poignée du matériau disparaît et les technoprêtres n'ont plus qu'à en suivre la trace radioactive pour repérer la tanière du monstre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour appâter l'ennemi, un "incident mortel" est mis en scène : une fuite de radiations provoquée par un conteneur de transuranium laissé ouvert. Peu après, une poignée du matériau disparaît et les technoprêtres n'ont plus qu'à en suivre la trace radioactive pour repérer la tanière du monstre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Um die Aufmerksamkeit des Feindes abzulenken, wurde ein "tödlicher Zwischenfall" inszeniert: ein Strahlungsleck, das durch einen geöffneten Transuranium-Container entstanden war. Kurz darauf verschwand eine Handvoll dieses gefährlichen Materials, und die weisen Techpriester nutzten die radioaktive Spur, um das Versteck des Monsters zu finden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Um die Aufmerksamkeit des Feindes abzulenken, wurde ein "tödlicher Zwischenfall" inszeniert: ein Strahlungsleck, das durch einen geöffneten Transuranium-Container entstanden war. Kurz darauf verschwand eine Handvoll dieses gefährlichen Materials, und die weisen Techpriester nutzten die radioaktive Spur, um das Versteck des Monsters zu finden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Düşmanın dikkatini çekmek için "ölümlü bir hadise" tertiplendi. Bir transuranyum konteyneri açık bırakılmış, bu sebeple radyasyon sızıntısı meydana gelmişti. Kısa süre sonra bu zararlı maddenin bir miktarı kaybolunca bilge Tekno Rahipler de canavarın inini bulmak için radyoaktif izi takip etti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To attract the enemy's attention, a "lethal incident" was staged: a radiation leak caused by an open transuranium container. Shortly after, a handful of this hazardous material went missing, and the wise Tech-Priests used the radioactive trail to locate the monster's lair.{/n}
